nodes.bodyText:
We should follow their regular expression exactly, imo, as it allows leeway on spacing.
https://github.com/pmd/pmd/blob/master/pmd-java/src/main/java/net/sourceforge/pmd/lang/java/rule/codestyle/CommentDefaultAccessModifierRule.java#L42
